title: Week 15 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Good Bad Luck - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/14
description:
Week 15 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode as we enter the first round of the fantasy playoffs! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 15 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 14th, 2021.
